citation.abstract: A novel method for cell reprogramming is been developed by immobilizing nucleic acid transfer vectors containing free amino groups, like lentiviral particles, onto pentafluorophenyl methacrylate (PFM)-modified surfaces obtained by PFM grafting affter Ar plasma treatment. This technique is able to reprogram murine somatic cells into pluripotent cells at high efficiencies. We call these modified surfaces cell reprogramming surfaces, or CRS.
citation.title: Efficient Cell Reprogramming Using Bioengineered Surfaces

news.title: Un biorreactor español envasa lotes de células madre en serie para la medicina regenerativa
news.summary: La start-up española Aglaris Cell tiene prácticamente listo para su comercialización el primer biorreactor del mundo que realiza cultivos celulares de manera totalmente automática y sin recurrir a aditivos tóxicos como la tripsina. El dispositivo ha desper
